title: Limits and continuity in topological spaces

blocks.name: ccn
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of continuous functions between topologies.
blocks.origin: const class ccn { Cn }

blocks.name: diff.ccn.s
diff.ccn.c
diff.ccn.w
ccnp
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of functions between topologies continuous at a given point.
blocks.origin: const class ccnp { CnP }

blocks.name: diff.ccnp.s
diff.ccnp.c
diff.ccnp.w
clm
blocks.content: Extend class notation with a function on topological spaces whose value is the convergence relation for limit sequences in the space.
blocks.origin: const class clm { ~~>t }

blocks.name: diff.clm.s
diff.clm.c
diff.clm.w
df-cn
blocks.content: Define a function on two topologies whose value is the set of continuous mappings from the first topology to the second. Based on definition of continuous function in [Munkres] p. 102. See ~ iscn for the predicate form. (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2006.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-cn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ccn, cmpo(s0, s1, ctop, ctop, crab(s2, co(cuni(cv(s1)), cmap, cuni(cv(s0))), wral(s3, cv(s1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s2)), cv(s3)), cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-cn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ Cn =(s0 ‚àà Top, s1 ‚àà Top ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà(‚ãÉ s1[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ s0)| ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1,(`' s2 " s3)‚àà s0)})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-cnp
blocks.content: Define a function on two topologies whose value is the set of continuous mappings at a specified point in the first topology. Based on Theorem 7.2(g) of [Munkres] p. 107. (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2006.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-cnp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(ccnp, cmpo(s0, s1, ctop, ctop, cmpt(s2, cuni(cv(s0)), crab(s3, co(cuni(cv(s1)), cmap, cuni(cv(s0))), wral(s4, cv(s1), wi(wcel(cfv(cv(s3), cv(s2)), cv(s4)), wrex(s5, cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s5)), wss(cima(cv(s3), cv(s5)), cv(s4))))))))))
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-cnp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ‚ä¢ CnP =(s0 ‚àà Top, s1 ‚àà Top ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ s0 ‚Ü¶ { s3 ‚àà(‚ãÉ s1[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ s0)| ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s1,((s3 ` s2)‚àà s4 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s5 ‚àà s0,(s2 ‚àà s5 ‚àß(s3 " s5)‚äÜ s4))))}))
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-lm
blocks.content: Define a function on topologies whose value is the convergence relation for sequences into the given topological space. Although ` f ` is typically a sequence (a function from an upperset of integers) with values in the topological space, it need not be. Note, however, that the limit property concerns only values at integers, so that the real-valued function ` ( x e. RR |-> ( sin `` ( _pi x. x ) ) ) ` converges to zero (in the standard topology on the reals) with this definition. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2006.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-lm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(clm, cmpt(s0, ctop, copab(s1, s2, w3a(wcel(cv(s1), co(cuni(cv(s0)), cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(s2), cuni(cv(s0))), wral(s3, cv(s0), wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wrex(s4, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(s1), cv(s4)), cv(s4), cv(s3)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-lm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ ~~>t =(s0 ‚àà Top ‚Ü¶ { < s1, s2 > |(s1 ‚àà(‚ãÉ s0[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)‚àß s2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ s0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s0,(s2 ‚àà s3 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s4 ‚àà ran(‚Ñ§‚â•),((s1 |` s4): s4 ‚Üí s3)))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
}

blocks.name: lmrel
blocks.content: The topological space convergence relation is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 7-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmrel(class c0) {
  |- wrel(cfv(clm, c0))
} = {
  relmptopab(hs1, hs0, hs2, clm, c0, ctop, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(hs2), cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(hs3, cv(hs1), wi(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wrex(hs4, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs4)), cv(hs4), cv(hs3)))))))
  df-lm(hs1, hs0, hs2, hs3, hs4)
  diff.hs1.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lmrel(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ Rel((~~>t ` c0))
} = {
  relmptopab(hs1, hs0, hs2, clm, c0, ctop, (hs0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ hs1[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)‚àß hs2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ hs1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs3 ‚àà hs1,(hs2 ‚àà hs3 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs4 ‚àà ran(‚Ñ§‚â•),((hs0 |` hs4): hs4 ‚Üí hs3))))))
  df-lm(hs1, hs0, hs2, hs3, hs4)
  diff.hs1.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
}

blocks.name: lmrcl
blocks.content: Reverse closure for the convergence relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmrcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2), wcel(c1, ctop))
} = {
  sseldi(c1, ctop, cdm(clm), wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2))
  dmmptss(hs0, clm, ctop, copab(hs1, hs2, w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), co(cuni(cv(hs0)), cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(hs2), cuni(cv(hs0))), wral(hs3, cv(hs0), wi(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wrex(hs4, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(hs1), cv(hs4)), cv(hs4), cv(hs3))))))))
  df-lm(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4)
  sylbi(wbr(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cdm(clm)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cfv(clm, c1)))
  df-br(c0, cfv(clm, c1), c2)
  elfvdm(cop(c0, c2), clm, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lmrcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[(~~>t ` c1)]c2 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Top)
} = {
  sseldi(c1, ctop, dom(~~>t), c0[(~~>t ` c1)]c2)
  dmmptss(hs0, clm, ctop, { < hs1, hs2 > |(hs1 ‚àà(‚ãÉ hs0[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)‚àß hs2 ‚àà ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs3 ‚àà hs0,(hs2 ‚àà hs3 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs4 ‚àà ran(‚Ñ§‚â•),((hs1 |` hs4): hs4 ‚Üí hs3)))))})
  df-lm(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4)
  sylbi(c0[(~~>t ` c1)]c2, c1 ‚àà dom(~~>t), < c0, c2 > ‚àà(~~>t ` c1))
  df-br(c0, (~~>t ` c1), c2)
  elfvdm(< c0, c2 >, clm, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
}

thm lmfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {

  eqsstri({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà(c1[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)‚àß s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà ran(‚Ñ§‚â•),((s0 |` s3): s3 ‚Üí s2)))))}, ((c1[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)√ó c1), { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ‚àà(c1[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà ran(‚Ñ§‚â•),((s0 |` s3): s3 ‚Üí s2)))))})
  opabbii(s0, s1, (s0 ‚àà(c1[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)‚àß s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà ran(‚Ñ§‚â•),((s0 |` s3): s3 ‚Üí s2))))), ((s0 ‚àà(c1[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà ran(‚Ñ§‚â•),((s0 |` s3): s3 ‚Üí s2))))))

thm cnfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wceq(co(c0, ccn, c2), crab(s0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), c0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, ccn, c2, crab(s0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), c0))), ctop, ctop, crab(s0, co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))), universe, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wceq(ccn, cmpo(hs0, hs1, ctop, ctop, crab(s0, co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))))))
  df-cn(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  rabeqbidv(s0, co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs0))), co(c3, cmap, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), c0)))
  oveq12d(cuni(cv(hs1)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs0)), c3, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  eqtr4d(cuni(cv(hs1)), c3, cuni(c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  unieqd(cv(hs1), c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(c3, cuni(c2)))
  toponuni(c2, c3)
  eqtr4d(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  unieqd(cv(hs0), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(c1, cuni(c0)))
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  raleqbidv(s1, cv(hs1), c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), c0))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  eleq2d(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c0, ctop))
  topontop(c0, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c2, ctop))
  topontop(c2, c3)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wcel(crab(s0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), c0))), universe))
  rabex(s0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), c0)))
  ovex(c3, cmap, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), c0))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(s0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), c0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))))
  diff.co.s(s0, cuni(cv(hs1)), cmap, cuni(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, cv(hs1))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cmap, c1)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c3)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ctopon, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ctopon, c3)
  diff.ctopon.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
}

thm cnfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))‚Üí(c0[Cn]c2)= { s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(`' s0 " s1)‚àà c0)})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, ccn, c2, { s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(`' s0 " s1)‚àà c0)}, ctop, ctop, { s0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ hs1[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ hs0)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1,(`' s0 " s1)‚àà hs0)}, universe, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)), Cn =(hs0 ‚àà Top, hs1 ‚àà Top ‚Ü¶ { s0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ hs1[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ hs0)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1,(`' s0 " s1)‚àà hs0)}))
  df-cn(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  rabeqbidv(s0, (‚ãÉ hs1[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ hs0), (c3[‚Ü¶]c1), ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))‚àß(hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1,(`' s0 " s1)‚àà hs0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(`' s0 " s1)‚àà c0))
  oveq12d(‚ãÉ hs1, cmap, ‚ãÉ hs0, c3, c1, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))‚àß(hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2)))
  eqtr4d(‚ãÉ hs1, c3, ‚ãÉ c2, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))‚àß(hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2)))
  unieqd(hs1, c2, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))‚àß(hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2)))

thm iscn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wb(wcel(c4, co(c0, ccn, c2)), wa(wf(c4, c1, c3), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cv(s0)), c0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wcel(c4, co(c0, ccn, c2)), wa(wf(c4, c1, c3), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cv(s0)), c0))), wcel(c4, crab(hs0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), c0)))))
  eleq2d(c4, co(c0, ccn, c2), crab(hs0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))))
  cnfval(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wcel(c4, crab(hs0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), c0)))), wa(wf(c4, c1, c3), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cv(s0)), c0))), wa(wcel(c4, co(c3, cmap, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cv(s0)), c0))))
  elrab(hs0, c4, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cv(s0)), c0)))
  ralbidv(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cv(s0)), c0))

  cnveq(cv(hs0), c4)

  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wb(wcel(c4, co(c3, cmap, c1)), wf(c4, c1, c3)), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c0))

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))‚Üí(c4 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c2)‚Üî((c4 : c1 ‚Üí c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(`' c4 " s0)‚àà c0))))

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)), c4 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c2), ((c4 : c1 ‚Üí c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(`' c4 " s0)‚àà c0)), c4 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(`' hs0 " s0)‚àà c0)})

  elrab(hs0, c4, (c3[‚Ü¶]c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(`' hs0 " s0)‚àà c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(`' c4 " s0)‚àà c0))
  ralbidv(s0, c2, hs0 = c4, (`' hs0 " s0)‚àà c0, (`' c4 " s0)‚àà c0)

  syl2anr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), (c4 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Üî(c4 : c1 ‚Üí c3)), c3 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c0)

thm cnpval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c4, c1)), wceq(cfv(co(c0, ccnp, c2), c4), crab(s0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s1, c2, wi(wcel(cfv(cv(s0), c4), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(c4, cv(s2)), wss(cima(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cv(s1)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)

thm cnpval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((c0[CnP]c2)` c4)= { s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0 ` c4)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(c4 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((c0[CnP]c2)` c4)= { s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0 ` c4)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(c4 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1))))}), d(s2, c1))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((c0[CnP]c2)` c4)= { s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0 ` c4)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(c4 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1))))}), d(s2, c2))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà c1)‚Üí((c0[CnP]c2)` c4)= { s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0 ` c4)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(c4 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1))))}), d(s2, c3))
  3impa(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), c4 ‚àà c1, ((c0[CnP]c2)` c4)= { s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0 ` c4)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(c4 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1))))})
  sylan9eq(((c0[CnP]c2)` c4), { s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0 ` c4)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(c4 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1))))}, ((hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0 ` hs0)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1))))})` c4), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)), c4 ‚àà c1)
  fveq1d((c0[CnP]c2), c4, (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0 ` hs0)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1))))}), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)))
  cnpfval(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  fvmpt(hs0, c4, c1, (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0 ` hs0)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1))))}), { s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0 ` c4)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(c4 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1))))}, { s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0 ` hs0)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1))))})
  rabbidv(s0, (c3[‚Ü¶]c1), hs0 = c4, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0 ` hs0)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1)))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0 ` c4)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(c4 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1)))))
  ralbidv(s1, c2, hs0 = c4, ((s0 ` hs0)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1))), ((s0 ` c4)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(c4 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c4, (s0 ` hs0)‚àà s1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1)), (s0 ` c4)‚àà s1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(c4 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1)))
  eleq1d((s0 ` hs0), s1, (s0 ` c4), hs0 = c4)
  fveq2(hs0, c4, s0)
  rexbidv(s2, c0, hs0 = c4, (hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1), (c4 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c4, hs0 ‚àà s2, (s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1, c4 ‚àà s2)
  eleq1(hs0, c4, s2)
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0 ` hs0)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1))))}))
  rabex(s0, (c3[‚Ü¶]c1), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0 ` c4)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(c4 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1)))))
  ovex(c3, cmap, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,((s0 ` c4)‚àà s1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c0,(c4 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s0 " s2)‚äÜ s1))))})
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cmap, c1)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
}

  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3))), wcel(c5, crab(hs0, co(c3, cmap, c1), wral(s0, c2, wi(wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c4), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(c4, cv(s1)), wss(cima(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))))), wa(wf(c5, c1, c3), wral(s0, c2, wi(wcel(cfv(c5, c4), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(c4, cv(s1)), wss(cima(c5, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))), wa(wcel(c5, co(c3, cmap, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wi(wcel(cfv(c5, c4), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wcel(c4, cv(s1)), wss(cima(c5, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))))

  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(c1, ctop))

  eqid(cuni(c1))

blocks.name: tgcnp
blocks.content: The "continuous at a point" predicate when the range is given by a basis for a topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: subbascn
blocks.content: The continuity predicate when the range is given by a subbasis for a topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

blocks.name: ssidcn
blocks.content: The identity function is a continuous function from one topology to another topology on the same set iff the domain is finer than the codomain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssidcn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wb(wcel(cres(cid, c1), co(c0, ccn, c2)), wss(c2, c0)))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wcel(cres(cid, c1), co(c0, ccn, c2)), wss(c2, c0), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0)))
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wcel(cres(cid, c1), co(c0, ccn, c2)), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0)), wa(wf(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0))))
  iscn(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c1, cres(cid, c1))
  biantrur(wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0)), wf(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1))
  ax-mp(wf(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1), wf1o(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1))
  f1oi(c1)
  f1of(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1)
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0)), wss(c2, c0), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ralbidva(hs0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wcel(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1d(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), c0, cv(hs0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  syl5eq(cima(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), cima(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  imaeq1i(ccnv(cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs0), cres(cid, c1))
  cnvresid(c1)
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cima(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  sseqtr4d(cv(hs0), c1, cuni(c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c2)))

  toponuni(c2, c1)
  resiima(cv(hs0), c1)
  dfss3(hs0, c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(cid, c1))

thm ssidcn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))‚Üí((= |` c1)‚àà(c0[Cn]c2)‚Üî c2 ‚äÜ c0))

  iscn(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c1, (= |` c1))
  biantrur(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,(`'(= |` c1)" hs0)‚àà c0), ((= |` c1): c1 ‚Üí c1))
  ax-mp(((= |` c1): c1 ‚Üí c1), ((= |` c1): c1 ‚Üî c1))
  f1oi(c1)
  f1of((= |` c1), c1, c1)
  syl6bbr((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,(`'(= |` c1)" hs0)‚àà c0), c2 ‚äÜ c0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c0))
  ralbidva(hs0, c2, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)), (`'(= |` c1)" hs0)‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c0)
  eleq1d((`'(= |` c1)" hs0), c0, hs0, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  syl5eq((`'(= |` c1)" hs0), hs0, ((= |` c1)" hs0), ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  imaeq1i(`'(= |` c1), hs0, (= |` c1))
  cnvresid(c1)
  syl(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), ((= |` c1)" hs0)= hs0, hs0 ‚äÜ c1)
  sseqtr4d(hs0, c1, ‚ãÉ c2, ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  adantl((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)), hs0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c2)
  elssuni(hs0, c2)
  ad2antlr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c2, c1 = ‚ãÉ c2)

blocks.name: cnpimaex
blocks.content: Property of a function continuous at a point. (Contributed by FL, 31-Dec-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnpimaex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(co(c1, ccnp, c2), c3)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c3), c4)), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wcel(c3, cv(s0)), wss(cima(c0, cv(s0)), c4))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

} = {

thm cnpimaex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà((c1[CnP]c2)` c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(c0 ` c3)‚àà c4)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0 " s0)‚äÜ c4)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  3imp(c0 ‚àà((c1[CnP]c2)` c3), c4 ‚àà c2, (c0 ` c3)‚àà c4, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0 " s0)‚äÜ c4)))
  simpl2im(c0 ‚àà((c1[CnP]c2)` c3), (c4 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí((c0 ` c3)‚àà c4 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0 " s0)‚äÜ c4)))), (c0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((c0 ` c3)‚àà hs0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0 " s0)‚äÜ hs0)))))
  simprbi(c0 ‚àà((c1[CnP]c2)` c3), ((c0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((c0 ` c3)‚àà hs0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0 " s0)‚äÜ hs0))))), (c1 ‚àà Top ‚àß c2 ‚àà Top ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c1))
  iscnp2(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÉ c2)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c1)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c2)
  rspccv(hs0, c2, c4, ((c0 ` c3)‚àà hs0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0 " s0)‚äÜ hs0))), ((c0 ` c3)‚àà c4 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0 " s0)‚äÜ c4))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c4, (c0 ` c3)‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0 " s0)‚äÜ hs0)), (c0 ` c3)‚àà c4, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0 " s0)‚äÜ c4)))
  eleq2(hs0, c4, (c0 ` c3))
  rexbidv(s0, c1, hs0 = c4, (c3 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0 " s0)‚äÜ hs0), (c3 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0 " s0)‚äÜ c4))
  anbi2d(hs0 = c4, c3 ‚àà s0, (c0 " s0)‚äÜ hs0, (c0 " s0)‚äÜ c4)
  sseq2(hs0, c4, (c0 " s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÉ c1)
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÉ c2)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c1)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ` c3)‚àà c4 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c3 ‚àà s0 ‚àß(c0 " s0)‚äÜ c4))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: idcn
blocks.content: A restricted identity function is a continuous function. (Contributed by FL, 27-Dec-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: lmbr
blocks.content: Express the binary relation "sequence ` F ` converges to point ` P ` " in a topological space. Definition 1.4-1 of [Kreyszig] p. 25. The condition ` F C_ ( CC X. X ) ` allows us to use objects more general than sequences when convenient; see the comment in ~ df-lm . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2013.)

  brab2a(hs0, hs1, c0, copab(hs0, hs1, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cpm, cc)), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wral(s0, c1, wi(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1), cv(s0))))))), c2, co(c3, cpm, cc), c3, wral(s0, c1, wi(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, crn(cuz), wf(cres(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wi(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, crn(cuz), wf(cres(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1), cv(s0))))))

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[(~~>t ` c1)]c2 ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà(c3[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c2 ‚àà s0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ran(‚Ñ§‚â•),((c0 |` s1): s1 ‚Üí s0)))))))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)

} = {

  syl(w0, (~~>t ` c1)= { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ‚àà(c3[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)‚àß hs1 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(hs1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà ran(‚Ñ§‚â•),((hs0 |` s1): s1 ‚Üí s0)))))}, c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))

blocks.name: lmbrf
blocks.content: Express the binary relation "sequence ` F ` converges to point ` P ` " in a metric space using an arbitrary upper set of integers. This version of ~ lmbr2 presupposes that ` F ` is a function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2013.)

blocks.content: Convergence property of a converging sequence. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2013.)

thm lmcvg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), c2))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfv(clm, c5), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {

thm lmcvg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(c1 ` s1)‚àà c2)))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1[(~~>t ` c5)]c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(c1 ` s1)‚àà c2)), c4 ‚àà c2)
  rspcdva(hs0, c2, c5, w0, (c4 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(c1 ` s1)‚àà c2))), (c4 ‚àà hs0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(c1 ` s1)‚àà hs0))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c2, c4 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(c1 ` s1)‚àà hs0)), c4 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(c1 ` s1)‚àà c2)))
  eleq2(hs0, c2, c4)
  rexralbidv(s0, s1, c0, (‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0), hs0 = c2, (c1 ` s1)‚àà hs0, (c1 ` s1)‚àà c2)
  eleq2(hs0, c2, (c1 ` s1))
  syl(w0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c5,(c4 ‚àà hs0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(c1 ` s1)‚àà hs0)))), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c5,(c4 ‚àà hs0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(s1 ‚àà dom(c1)‚àß(c1 ` s1)‚àà hs0))))))
  simp3d(w0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c5,(c4 ‚àà hs0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(s1 ‚àà dom(c1)‚àß(c1 ` s1)‚àà hs0))))), c1 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c5[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ), c4 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c5)
  mpbid(w0, (c1 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c5[p‚Ü¶]‚ÑÇ)‚àß c4 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c5 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c5,(c4 ‚àà hs0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s0),(s1 ‚àà dom(c1)‚àß(c1 ` s1)‚àà hs0)))))), c1[(~~>t ` c5)]c4)
  lmbr2(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c5, c4, ‚ãÉ c5, c0, c3, w0)
  sylib(w0, c5 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ c5), c5 ‚àà Top)

blocks.name: cnpnei
blocks.content: A condition for continuity at a point in terms of neighborhoods. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 7-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnpnei(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wf(c2, c3, c4)), wcel(c5, c3)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(co(c0, ccnp, c1), c5)), wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(cfv(c2, c5))), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c5))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  impbid(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wf(c2, c3, c4)), wcel(c5, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(co(c0, ccnp, c1), c5)), wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), csn(cfv(c2, c5))), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c5)))))

blocks.name: cnima
blocks.content: An open subset of the codomain of a continuous function has an open preimage. (Contributed by FL, 15-Dec-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c3), c1))
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c3), c1), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1)))
  simprd(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1)), wf(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2)))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wa(wf(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2)), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1))), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, ctop)))
  iscn2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, cuni(c1), cuni(c2))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  eqid(cuni(c2))
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c3, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c3), c1))
  eleq1d(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  imaeq2(cv(hs0), c3, ccnv(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c3), c1))
}

thm cnima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(`' c0 " c3)‚àà c1)
} = {
  sylan(c0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c2), c3 ‚àà c2, (`' c0 " c3)‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,(`' c0 " hs0)‚àà c1))
  simprd(c0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,(`' c0 " hs0)‚àà c1), (c0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c2))
  simprbi(c0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c2), ((c0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,(`' c0 " hs0)‚àà c1)), (c1 ‚àà Top ‚àß c2 ‚àà Top))
  iscn2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÉ c2)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c1)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c2)
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c3, (`' c0 " hs0)‚àà c1, (`' c0 " c3)‚àà c1)
  eleq1d((`' c0 " hs0), c1, (`' c0 " c3), hs0 = c3)
  imaeq2(hs0, c3, `' c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÉ c1)
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÉ c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w((`' c0 " c3)‚àà c1)
}

  syl2anr(c0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c2), c3 ‚àà(c2[Cn]c4), ((c3 ‚àò c0): ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c4), (c3 : ‚ãÉ c2 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c4), (c0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c2))
  cnf(c3, c2, c4, ‚ãÉ c2, ‚ãÉ c4)
  cnf(c0, c1, c2, ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÉ c2)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c2)
  fco(c3, ‚ãÉ c2, ‚ãÉ c4, c0, ‚ãÉ c1)

  simpll(c0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c2), c3 ‚àà(c2[Cn]c4), hs0 ‚àà c4)
  adantll(c0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c2), c3 ‚àà(c2[Cn]c4), hs0 ‚àà c4, (`' c3 " hs0)‚àà c2)

blocks.name: iscncl
blocks.content: A characterization of a continuity function using closed sets. Theorem 1(d) of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.9. (Contributed by FL, 19-Nov-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)

blocks.content: Continuity in terms of closure. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Oct-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: cnss2
blocks.content: If the topology ` K ` is finer than ` J ` , then there are fewer continuous functions into ` K ` than into ` J ` from some other space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)

thm cnss2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c3, ccn, c2), co(c3, ccn, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c0, c2)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, ccn, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, ccn, c0)))
  mpbir2and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, ccn, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, ccn, c0)), wf(cv(hs0), cuni(c3), c1), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c3)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, ccn, c2)), wf(cv(hs0), cuni(c3), c1))
  cnf(cv(hs0), c3, c2, cuni(c3), c1)
  eqid(cuni(c3))
  sylc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, ccn, c2))), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c3)), wss(c0, c2), wral(hs1, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c3)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, ccn, c2)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, ccn, c2)), wral(hs1, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c3)))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, ccn, c2)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c3))
  cnima(cv(hs0), c3, c2, cv(hs1))
  ssralv(hs1, c0, c2, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c3))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, ccn, c2))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, ccn, c0)), wa(wf(cv(hs0), cuni(c3), c1), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c3)))), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c3))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  sylib(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, ccn, c2))), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c3))), wcel(c3, ctop))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, ccn, c2)), wcel(c3, ctop))
  cntop1(cv(hs0), c3, c2)
  toptopon2(c3)
  simpll(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, ccn, c2)))
  iscn(hs1, c3, cuni(c3), c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c3, ccn, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c3, ccn, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c0, c2)))

  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c3))

  adantl((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2), hs0 ‚àà(c3[Cn]c2), c3 ‚àà Top)
  cntop1(hs0, c3, c2)
  toptopon2(c3)

blocks.content: A continuous function is continuous at all points. One direction of Theorem 7.2(g) of [Munkres] p. 107. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 20-Nov-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: cnsscnp
blocks.content: The set of continuous functions is a subset of the set of continuous functions at a point. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 21-Oct-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: cncnp
blocks.content: A continuous function is continuous at all points. Theorem 7.2(g) of [Munkres] p. 107. (Contributed by NM, 15-May-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: cncnp2
blocks.content: A continuous function is continuous at all points. Theorem 7.2(g) of [Munkres] p. 107. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 20-Nov-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

} = {
  pm5.21nd(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cfv(co(c2, ccnp, c3), cv(s0)))), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0)), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c4))), wf(c1, c0, c4)))

  anbi1i(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wf(c2, c3, c4), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c4))))

blocks.name: cnprest2
blocks.content: Equivalence of point-continuity in the parent topology and point-continuity in a subspace. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Aug-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)

blocks.content: Every function is continuous when the domain is discrete. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)

thm cndis(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

blocks.name: paste
blocks.content: Pasting lemma. If ` A ` and ` B ` are closed sets in ` X ` with ` A u. B = X ` , then any function whose restrictions to ` A ` and ` B ` are continuous is continuous on all of ` X ` . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: lmff
blocks.content: If ` F ` converges, there is some upper integer set on which ` F ` is a total function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: lmcls
blocks.content: Any convergent sequence of points in a subset of a topological space converges to a point in the closure of the subset. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)

blocks.name: lmcld
blocks.content: Any convergent sequence of points in a closed subset of a topological space converges to a point in the set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmcld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c6, cfv(clm, c4), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eleqtrd(c0, c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c4), c1), w0)
  lmcls(s0, c0, c4, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  sseqtr4d(c1, c5, cuni(c4), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c1, cuni(c4)), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4)))
  cldss(c1, c4, cuni(c4))
  eqid(cuni(c4))
  syl(w0, wceq(c5, cuni(c4)), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c5)))
  toponuni(c4, c5)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c4), c1), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c4)))
  cldcls(c1, c4)
}

blocks.name: lmcn
blocks.content: The image of a convergent sequence under a continuous map is convergent to the image of the original point. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmcn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(ccom(c0, c1), cfv(clm, c2), cfv(c0, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfv(clm, c4), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c4, ccn, c2)))
} = {
  lmcnp(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(co(c4, ccnp, c2), c3)), wcel(c0, co(c4, ccn, c2)), wcel(c3, cuni(c4)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c3, cuni(c4)), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c4))), wbr(c1, cfv(clm, c4), c3))
  sylib(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c4))), wcel(c4, ctop))
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, ctop), wcel(c0, co(c4, ccn, c2)))
  cntop1(c0, c4, c2)
  toptopon2(c4)
  lmcl(c4, cuni(c4), c1, c3)
  cncnpi(c0, c4, c2, c3, cuni(c4))
  eqid(cuni(c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lmcn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àò c1)[(~~>t ` c2)](c0 ` c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1[(~~>t ` c4)]c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c4[Cn]c2))
} = {
  lmcnp(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, c0 ‚àà((c4[CnP]c2)` c3), c0 ‚àà(c4[Cn]c2), c3 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c4)
  syl2anc(w0, c3 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c4, c4 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ c4), c1[(~~>t ` c4)]c3)
  sylib(w0, c4 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ c4), c4 ‚àà Top)
  syl(w0, c4 ‚àà Top, c0 ‚àà(c4[Cn]c2))
  cntop1(c0, c4, c2)
  toptopon2(c4)
  lmcl(c4, ‚ãÉ c4, c1, c3)
  cncnpi(c0, c4, c2, c3, ‚ãÉ c4)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c4)
}
